title: Bug 42724: StyledText selection rendering issue on bidi platforms
description: On bidi platforms, the selection in StyledText is rendered incorrectly. Currently, the entire selection background is redrawn, although there is code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine that handles creating a style range for the selection.
OB: Selection background is erroneously redrawn entirely, leading to incorrect rendering on bidi platforms.
EB: The drawLineSelectionBackground function should be used exclusively to render the special line break selection, not for the entire selection rendering.
SR:
1. Open StyledText on a bidi platform.
2. Select text within the StyledText component.
3. Observe the incorrect rendering of the selection background.
4. Verify that drawLineSelectionBackground is used inappropriately for the entire selection rendering.
